content: Multitool scraper blade High carbon steel (HCS) scraper blade attachment for the oscillating multitool, for scraping paint or glue ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly insert the scraper attachment to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications Scraping paint, glue, and other soft materials during renovations Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Starlock HCS scraper blade, recommended for removing glue and paint. 2 width. Technical Data | Additional Accessory Information | Starlock HCS scraper blade, recommended for removing glue and paint. 2 width. ### ITEMS- 2368508 - Scraper SMT HCS - Package Size 1 pc
